Package ee.sk.digidoc.factory

Interface Summary
CanonicalizationFactory Interface for canonicalization functions
CRLFactory Interface for handling CRL-s DigiDoc files
DigiDocFactory Interface for reading and writing DigiDoc files
NotaryFactory Interface for notary functions
SignatureFactory Interface for signature and other cryptographic functions.
TimestampFactory Interface for timestamp functions
 

Class Summary
BouncyCastleNotaryFactory Implements the NotaryFactory by using BouncyCastle JCE toolkit
BouncyCastleTimestampFactory Implements the TimestampFactory by using BouncyCastle JCE toolkit
CRLCheckerFactory Handles CRL download from SK server using LDAP or HTTP connection and uses it for verifying certificates.
DOMCanonicalizationFactory Canonicalizes XML using DOM and XPath
IAIKNotaryFactory Implements the NotaryFactory by using IAIK JCE toolkit
PKCS11SignatureFactory PKCS#11 based signature implementation
SAXDigiDocFactory SAX implementation of DigiDocFactory Provides methods for reading a DigiDoc file
 

Exception Summary
SAXDigiDocException SAXExcepton subclass, that has the same data as DigiDocException
